The Trust Board of Forward Education Trust has decided to suspend the activity of the Local Academy Council for up to a 12-month period, to be replaced by an Education Advisory Board (EAB). The EAB will work in conjunction with school leaders, the whole staff team and the Trust Executive Team.  We will continue to work hard for the boys, their families and our staff colleagues as we move Lea Hall Academy forward together.    The EAB will communicate to parents regularly, via school leaders and the Chief Executive of the Trust, with regards to plans for the school and progress being made.  

Any queries can be directed to ceo@fet.ac or head@leahall.fet.ac

Helen Redican -EAB Chair

Helen has worked both within schools and as a school improvement advisor for many years, supporting schools that need rapid improvement.  She has considerable expertise in the evaluation of educational standards across a range of settings, leadership and governance of schools of all phases and types, early years provision and partnership working with local authorities and officers of the DFE.

Helen is a trustee at Forward Education Trust and is currently the Chair of the Education Committee.
